abstract: Christopher Clarey On Figure Skating column profiles Denis Ten, first Kazakh to win world or Olympic medal in figure skating and who is part of Almaty bid team for 2022 Olympics; notes Ten is preparing for world championships in Shanghai, where he hopes to secure his first gold medal.
lead_paragraph: Ten, who is competing at this week’s world championships in Shanghai, is the first Kazakh to win a world or Olympic medal in figure skating and is part of the Almaty bid team for the 2022 Winter Games.

headline.main: Globe-Trotting Denis Ten Aims to Break New Ground
headline.print_headline: Globe-Trotter Aims to Break New Ground

snippet: Ten, who is competing at this week’s world championships in Shanghai, is the first Kazakh to win a world or Olympic medal in figure skating and is part of the Almaty bid team for the 2022 Winter Games.
